DOC.detailed_description: Whether old woman susceptible acquire new , persistent high-risk ( HR ) HPV infection new sex partner largely unknown . This longitudinal study predictor HR HPV infection two population woman age 25 44 45 65 used internet date website past year . 300 woman recruit mailed kit self-collecting vaginal specimen HPV DNA test . Women self-collect four set vaginal specimen four month apart , complete sexual behavior questionnaire time self-collection . We identify behavioral health predictor type-specific HR HPV infection , predictor repeatedly-detected HR HPV infection , evaluate study participant ' experience self-collecting vaginal specimen attitude towards HPV vaccination cervical cancer screening . This information important develop guideline HPV vaccine implementation cervical cancer screen guideline population old woman .
